meta.title: Ana Rose
meta.description: Developed the Future of UFC Sports Ecosystem despite not being a sports fan.

project.title: Brief
project.description: Ana Rose is a Dallas-based cleaning service brand founded by a solo entrepreneur looking to grow beyond word-of-mouth referrals. Originally focused on small residential cleanings, Ana Rose aimed to elevate its brand, streamline operations, and expand into larger residential projects and commercial contracts. I partnered with the founder to design a cohesive brand identity, build a modern website, and develop an online booking experience tailored to her target clientele.
project.goals:
•	Refresh the brand to feel professional, trustworthy, and scalable
•	Launch a website with built-in scheduling and quote requests
•	Support expansion into higher-value residential and commercial markets
project.challenges: Before diving into visuals, I learned about each brand’s goals, market positioning, and existing identity challenges.
project.solutions: Before diving into visuals, I learned about each brand’s goals, market positioning, and existing identity challenges.

meta.title: Queendom Farms
meta.description: Defined the visual concept and design language for the Lincoln Zephyr 2022 but never seen it in real life.

project.title: Brief
project.description: Queendon Farms is an urban flower and fruit farm based in Georgia, aiming to establish itself in an industry traditionally dominated by men. Founded by two women inspired and empowered by agriculture, they set out to create a strong and authentic brand identity of their own
project.goals: * Become a household name | * Create a strong brand identity | * Establish a unique market position
project.challenges: Establish a brand identity in an industry dominated by men
project.solutions: Develop a brand identity that reflects the founders' values and mission, while appealing to a diverse audience
